snippet: Minnesota's Sixth Congressional District, which Michele Bachmann has represented since 2007, could be redrawn to her disadvantage.
abstract: Minnesota's Sixth Congressional District, which Michele Bachmann has represented since 2007, could be redrawn to her disadvantage.
lead_paragraph: WEST DES MOINES, Iowa -- Having only decided not to continue her presidential bid on Wednesday morning, Representative Michele Bachmann of Minnesota has yet to decide whether to run for re-election to Congress.

headline.main: Bachmann's Next Decision: Whether to Run for Re-election
